# NEDNSProtocol.HTTPS

**Case**

The DNS server uses DNS-over-HTTPS.

## Declaration

```swift
case HTTPS
```

## DNS protocols

- **NEDNSProtocol.cleartext**: The DNS server uses cleartext UDP or TCP over port 53.
- **NEDNSProtocol.TLS**: The DNS server uses DNS-over-TLS.
